entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind northeast 30 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 36 this morning and minus 27 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CDT Sunday 19 March 2023
